caption.center: STATE OF HAWAI'I, Plaintiff-Appellee-Respondent, v. JAMES GEORGE

opinion.posture: CERTIORARI TO THE INTERMEDIATE COURT OF APPEALS (CR. NO. 03-1-1723).
opinion.opinion_byline:
By: LEVINSON, J., for the court.[fn1]
[fn1] Considered by: Moon, C.J., Levinson, Nakayama, Acoba, and Duffy, JJ.
opinion.opinion_text:
The opinion of the court, filed on November 30, 2007 is hereby corrected as to the following:
Page 7, last line: "September 19, 1993" should be "September 19, 2003." The sentence beginning on the last line to read:
On September 19, 2003, the circuit court entered an.
The Clerk of the Court is directed to incorporate the foregoing change in the original opinion.
